page.title: 09The Vicar Kimberworth Park
page.content: Mr Graham Whitcroft is vicar at St Johns Green. He is 47 years old and has been vicar for 13 years. Mr Whitcroft said all his days are busy. He gets up at 6 o'clock everyday to meet his curate at church. Today, Wednesday May 15th, Mr Whitcroft gave a speech at Greasborough Church about visiting sick people. Then he picked his children up from school, took the dog for a walk and had his dinner. He went to church to pray with the curate and then saw 5 ladies about a barbecue. He saw Mrs Hardy about a problem child and a lady whose mother had died. Then he came home for tea and watched the news. After seeing another lady he got home at 9.15pm. He earns 250 pounds a month. He once forgot a funeral and booked 2 weddings for the same time.
